mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.password, u.name, u.phone, c.code as companyCode, c.name as companyName FROM users u LEFT JOIN company c ON u.company_code = c.code WHERE u.id = #{id} AND u.password = #{password}
select u.id, u.password, u.name, u.phone, c.name as companyName, c.code as companyCode from users u, company c where u.company_code = c.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (id, password, name, phone, company_code) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{companyCode})
